entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
